Radlibrary

The Radlibrary package is an R package to facilitate querying the Facebook Ad Library through the Facebook Ad Library API. If you’re looking for more details about the ads that make up the Ad Library and you’ve got some experience using R, you’re in the right place.

Installation

To install directly from Github, use devtools:

devtools::install_github("facebookresearch/Radlibrary")

Getting started

Please see vignette("Radlibrary") or the pkgdown site.

License

Radlibrary is licensed under the 3-Clause BSD License. See LICENSE.

Contributing

Please note that the ‘Radlibrary’ project is released with a Contributor Code of Conduct. By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms. See the Contributing to Radlibrary guide for more information on contributing.
